values.name: sandbox
values.description: In sandbox, no external services (e.g. orders, payments, logistics) will generate real transactions

values.name: production
values.description: In production, all external services are live and will generate real transactions

values.name: thumbnail
values.description: Thumbnail images identify the image to use when displaying products in the Flow Console.

values.name: checkout
values.description: Checkout images identify the item image to use when displaying the item in the context of a consumer checkout (e.g. cart, checkout page).

unit_of_measurement.description: Defines the units of measurement that we support. As units are added, we conform with the standard units provided by jscience as part of JSR 363 - see http://jscience.org/api/javax/measure/unit/SI.html and http://jscience.org/api/javax/measure/unit/NonSI.html

values.name: inch
values.description: A unit of length equal to 0.01004 m (standard name in).

values.name: foot
values.description: A unit of length equal to 0.3048 m (standard name ft).

values.name: cubic_inch
values.description: A unit of volume equal to one cubic inch (in³).

values.name: cubic_meter
values.description: The metric unit for volume quantities (m³).

values.name: gram
values.description: A unit of mass equal to 1 / 1000 kilogram (standard name g).

values.name: kilogram
values.description: The base unit for mass quantities (kg).

values.name: meter
values.description: The base unit for length quantities (m).

values.name: ounce
values.description: A unit of mass equal to 1 / 16 POUND (standard name oz).

values.name: pound
values.description: A unit of mass equal to 453.59237 grams (avoirdupois pound, standard name lb).

deminimis.description: De Minimis describes the country specific rules for exactly how tax and duties are calculated, as well as any exemptions that apply. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/De_minimis for more information.

organization.description: Represents a single organization in the system, and what environment it is currently operating in.

item.description: The Flow item defines a specific item that can be purchased by a consumer. For many clients, this will map to a Sku.

fields.name: attributes
fields.description: Attributes of the items. An attribute of type intent must be given as a string representation of a decimal to be correctly localized.

price.description: Represents an amount-currency pair for a basic price

fields.name: currency
fields.description: ISO 4217 3 currency code as defined in https://api.flow.io/reference/currencies

image.description: The URL to an image, with optional tags. Flow Commerce primarily uses images to enhance the administrative tools (e.g. showing an item image in console)

fields.name: url
fields.description: The full URL to the image

fields.name: tags
fields.description: Tags can be used to identify the type of image being sent

item_harmonization.description: Everything we know about an item's harmonization.

fields.name: countries_of_origin
fields.description: Country code iso31663

fields.name: tariffs
fields.description: Destination country code iso31663 to tariff codes

tariff_code_duty.description: For a specific destination, the full tariff_code and associated duties.

fields.name: tariff_code
fields.description: Code for the a specific destination. Also known as hs10.

fields.name: duties
fields.description: Origin country code iso31663 to duties

duties.description: For a specific origin and destination, the associated duties.

fields.name: duty_rate
fields.description: The original model for duty rate.

fields.name: duty_rate_v2
fields.description: A newer, more complex/accurate, model for duty rate.

duty.description: Represents a simple model of duties that apply to a given item / trade lane.

fields.name: rate
fields.description: The combined duty rate. A value of 25 indicates a duty rate of 25%

fields.name: components
fields.description: The components to which duty is applied.

fields.name: deminimis
fields.description: Describes the duty de minimis if there is one for this destination

fields.name: name
fields.description: Generally used for Where this rate came from and potentially its type.

deminimis_simple.description: De Minimis for most common example which includes a value threshold and rules on what components are used in the duty calculation

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value below which no tax or duty is collected, which is a sum of the values associated with the de minimis components.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: The ISO-4217 3 character currency code in which the value is calculated.

fields.name: components
fields.description: The components that are used to determine the value. Note that these components may be different from the components for the VAT or duty itself.

fields.name: minimum
fields.description: If the calculated VAT or duty amount is less than the minimum, no VAT or duty is owed. In other words, this is the minimum payable amount.

deminimis_per_item.description: De Minimis per item describes rules which require minimum and/or maximum values per item

fields.name: currency
fields.description: The ISO-4217 3 character currency code in which the value is calculated

fields.name: minimum
fields.description: If specified, the minimum amount due per item

fields.name: maximum
fields.description: If specified, the maximum amount due per item

fields.name: raw_id
fields.description: id of the duty_raw from which this was generated

fields.name: destination
fields.description: alpha-3 ISO 3166-1

fields.name: origin
fields.description: alpha-3 ISO 3166-1

fields.name: parser_version
fields.description: Version of parser that translated between raw and structured duty rate.

duty_simple_expression.description: Non-compound duty expression: percent of price or 9.9 per unit of measure

fields.name: type
fields.description: free, precent of price, etc

duty_compound_expression.description: nestable binary operation such as SUM, MAX, MIN

fields.name: type
fields.description: sum, max, min

subcatalog.description: A configuration with custom query to select a subset of master catalog items for a localized experience

name.description: Find organizations with this name. Case insensitive. Exact match.

parent.description: Find organizations that belong to this specified parent organization id. Case insensitive. Exact match.
